name: Thedipidi.com
overview: Thedipidi.com is a useful search-engine, especially designed for Tamil community to search and find the items they are looking for quickly and easily. The specialty of this website is it provides two-way search, both category-wise and product / service-wise. â€œMap search,â€ - its another feature- locates the business places on the map and directs the people to find the way to those places. Moreover, it has so many features such as, Buy & Sale, Information, Horoscope Calendar, Current & upcoming events, Sports, Cinema, Music, and Entertainment. It also provides a lot of useful links. People can save a lot of time by getting all web-based assistance at this single site. It is not only helpful but also entertaining.
